Title: Authorizes municipalities in Suffolk county to establish programs for senior citizen rent exemptions and real property tax abatements
Summary: Authorizes municipalities in the county of Suffolk to establish programs for providing real property tax exemptions and abatements to landlords of senior citizens for the units occupied by the senior citizens; requires such abatements be passed through to seniors in the form of rent reductions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a senior citizen rent exemption and tax abatement program within Suffolk county
